alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains; Coeur d'Alene Area; Idaho Palouse (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 10:35AM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Benewah, southwestern Kootenai and southeastern Spokane Counties through 1000 AM PDT... At 935 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Plummer, or 19 miles west of St. Maries, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Plummer, Harrison, Fairfield, Rockford, and Worley. This includes U.S. Highway 95 in Idaho between mile markers 389 and 422. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Panhandle Mountains; Coeur d'Alene Area; Idaho Palouse
